description: Another dragon Ryuji` met during his trip to the beach. She is the princess of the ice dragons. Initially she has a haughty attitude towards Ryuji, but she warms up towards him eventually. It is implied she likes Ryuji, as she blushes when Ryuji is around. She asks Ryuji for a favor, taking back a cursed precious, from another level 10 Breaker, George Evans. After the incident, she shows up in the last 2 episodes of the anime, where she convinced Ryuji to go save Rose. The black dragon, Onyx, used to live in her land, they have known each other since childhood.
name: Maruga
